character.data.tenzin.name: Tenzin
character.data.tenzin.description: Since young, Tenzin has been studying the ancient texts where the Conjunction of the Planes was foretold. The calling is here. Time to put these years of training to good use.
character.data.tenzin.playstyle: Geared towards generating Mana and activating powerful Spells and Abilities
character.data.tenzin.description.visual: Mysterious looking monk wearing a red cape and a large pointy hoody. His face is not visible in the shadow of the hood and feels like he has no discernable face. His red outfit is bordered with golden threads. His hands are also wrapped in brown parchment-like bandages. He is holding a long circular string made of red beads. He is wearing an intimidating silver necklace with the face of a monster with gaping mouth.
